hero.h1:
Online intensive course by numerologist and
women's mentor Maria Kovalenko

description: Maria Kovalenko is Practicing Vedic numerologist, astrologer, psychologist, and women's mentor.
Mother of three, happily married for 16 years
Received a blessing from a spiritual mentor to provide counseling and share knowledge
Author and organizer of women's circles and gatherings
Guest speaker at international festivals and women's events
Over 10 years of experience in supporting women's well-being

results.title: Your results after the "Resource" Intensive
list: You will stop snapping at your husband and children.
You will be able to dedicate time to yourself without sacrificing your family.
You will realize that your energy is directly linked to your income level.
You will begin attracting more opportunities and increasing your income without burnout.
You will stop earning at the cost of your health and nerves
You will learn to set personal boundaries effectively—without guilt.
You will stop giving all your energy to others and neglecting yourself.
You will learn to set personal boundaries effectively—without guilt.
You will understand where your energy goes and stop draining your strength.
You will stop putting off your dreams and start taking action.
You will reduce stress and anxiety using simple techniques.
You will eliminate accumulated fatigue and regain a sense of ease.
You will boost your overall energy levels and overcome chronic fatigue.

card1.title: Out of love for yourself
items: 5 video lessons for creating your own life strategy in the resource
Eliminate weakness and apathy with a unique, action-based strategy for lasting energy and resilience.
After registration you will get a bonus mood-meditation for the day

card2.title: This course is for you if
items: You feel fatigue, apathy and lack of energy
You're burnt out at work and don't know how to recover
You are confused and do not understand what you want
You want to regain drive, joy and interest in life
You're ready to stop procrastinating and start acting

card3.title: Intensive Program
items: Access to all materials for 2 months
Private chat for communication and support
Mastermind with live breakdowns in real time.
5 video lessons for creating your own life strategy in the resource

list.title: Day 1
list.step1: The difference between masculine and feminine resources.
list.step2: Understanding that resource is a tangible asset, not something amorphous.

list.title: Day 2
list.step2: Identifying actions that drain versus replenish your resource.

list.title: Day 3
list.step2: Discovering where to find time to replenish your resource.

list.title: Day 4
list.step1: Exploring the resources of the body and mind.
list.step2: Recognizing resource leaks and how to fix them.

list.title: Day 5
list.step1: Online mastermind with me, where I will answer all your questions.

bonus.title: Bonus
checklist: Checklist : What Gives and What Drains Your Resource
